column5: PIRATES COVE and RV is a beautiful beachfront destination Mansion. THE most exquisite property on the Beach! No detail or expense was spared when creating these two magnificent beach houses. Cove Sleeps 37 or sleep 70 total if you rent both houses! (PIRATES BEACH) Voted best property in Crystal Beach! Bring a full size RV! (power and water only, extra fee applies, ask at check out)
